actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow income averaging for private forest landowners.
short_title: Tax Relief for Private Forest Landowners Act of 2005

summary.text: Tax Relief for Private Forest Landowners Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow income averaging for individuals who sell or exchange timber, on the same basis as is currently allowed for individuals engaged in a farming or fishing business.

titles.title: Tax Relief for Private Forest Landowners Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow income averaging for private forest landowners.
